scenarios.name: Create tutor resource

scenarios.name: Create service group

scenarios.name: Create math tutoring service

scenarios.name: Create package-like service product
scenarios.prompt: insert into service_products id = sp_math_20_uc8 biz_id = biz_tutoring_uc8 name = Math20SessionPack slug = math-20-session-pack kind = booking duration_mode = flexible default_duration_minutes = 60 min_duration_minutes = 30 max_duration_minutes = 120 duration_step_minutes = 30 base_price_amount = 0 currency = USD status = active is_published = true

scenarios.name: Create offer
scenarios.prompt: insert into offers id = ofr_pkg_uc8 biz_id = biz_tutoring_uc8 name = MathPackageOffer slug = math-package-offer execution_mode = slot status = active is_published = true timezone = America/Los_Angeles

scenarios.name: Create offer version
scenarios.prompt: insert into offer_versions id = ov_pkg_uc8 biz_id = biz_tutoring_uc8 offer_id = ofr_pkg_uc8 version = 1 status = published duration_mode = flexible default_duration_min = 60 min_duration_min = 30 max_duration_min = 120 duration_step_min = 30 base_price_minor = 0 currency = USD

scenarios.name: Create customer user
scenarios.prompt: insert into users id = usr_johnson_uc8 email = johnson.uc8@example.com name = JohnsonFamily status = active

scenarios.name: Create entitlement wallet
scenarios.prompt: insert into entitlement_wallets id = ew_johnson_uc8 biz_id = biz_tutoring_uc8 owner_user_id = usr_johnson_uc8 name = MathSessionWallet entitlement_type = pass unit_code = sessions balance_quantity = 20 is_active = true

scenarios.name: Create entitlement grant
scenarios.prompt: insert into entitlement_grants id = eg_johnson_uc8 biz_id = biz_tutoring_uc8 wallet_id = ew_johnson_uc8 grant_type = pass quantity = 20 valid_from_at = 2026-02-22T00:00:00Z valid_until_at = 2026-08-15T00:00:00Z rollover_eligible = false transferable = false reason = package_purchase

scenarios.name: Create recurring booking contract
scenarios.prompt: insert into standing_reservation_contracts id = src_johnson_uc8 biz_id = biz_tutoring_uc8 offer_id = ofr_pkg_uc8 offer_version_id = ov_pkg_uc8 location_id = loc_uc8 customer_user_id = usr_johnson_uc8 name = TuesdayMathSeries status = active timezone = America/Los_Angeles anchor_start_at = 2026-02-24T16:00:00Z default_duration_min = 60 recurrence_rule = "FREQ=WEEKLY;BYDAY=TU;INTERVAL=1" effective_start_date = 2026-02-24 effective_end_date = 2026-07-28 auto_create_orders = true

scenarios.name: Create booking order using package value
scenarios.prompt: insert into booking_orders id = bo_uc8_001 biz_id = biz_tutoring_uc8 offer_id = ofr_pkg_uc8 offer_version_id = ov_pkg_uc8 customer_user_id = usr_johnson_uc8 status = confirmed currency = USD subtotal_minor = 0 total_minor = 0 requested_start_at = 2026-02-24T16:00:00Z requested_end_at = 2026-02-24T17:00:00Z confirmed_start_at = 2026-02-24T16:00:00Z confirmed_end_at = 2026-02-24T17:00:00Z

scenarios.name: Add progress note
scenarios.prompt: insert into notes id = note_uc8_001 biz_id = biz_tutoring_uc8 target_type = booking_order booking_order_id = bo_uc8_001 visibility = private status = active source_type = user body = covered_quadratic_equations_review_factoring_next_week
